mn104:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava sakkesu viharati samagame.
mn104:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena nigantho nataputto pavayam adhunakalankato hoti.
mn104:2.2: Tassa kalankiriyaya bhinna nigantha dvedhikajata bhandanajata kalahajata vivadapanna annamannam mukhasattihi vitudanta viharanti:
mn104:2.3: “na tvam imam dhammavinayam ajanasi, aham imam dhammavinayam ajanami. Kim tvam imam dhammavinayam ajanissasi. Micchapatipanno tvamasi, ahamasmi sammapatipanno. Sahitam me, asahitam te. Purevacaniyam paccha avaca, pacchavacaniyam pure avaca. Adhicinnam te viparavattam. Aropito te vado. Niggahitosi, cara vadappamokkhaya; nibbethehi va sace pahosi”ti.
mn104:2.4: Vadhoyeva kho manne niganthesu nataputtiyesu vattati.
mn104:2.5: Yepi niganthassa nataputtassa savaka gihi odatavasana tepi niganthesu nataputtiyesu nibbinnarupa virattarupa pativanarupa yatha tam durakkhate dhammavinaye duppavedite aniyyanike anupasamasamvattanike asammasambuddhappavedite bhinnathupe appatisarane.
mn104:3.1: Atha kho cundo samanuddeso pavayam vassamvuttho yena samagamo yenayasma anando tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam anandam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho cundo samanuddeso ayasmantam anandam etadavoca:
mn104:3.3: Tassa kalankiriyaya bhinna nigantha dvedhikajata …pe… bhinnathupe appatisarane”ti.
mn104:4.1: Evam vutte, ayasma anando cundam samanuddesam etadavoca:
mn104:4.2: “atthi kho idam, avuso cunda, kathapabhatam bhagavantam dassanaya.
mn104:4.3: Ayama, avuso cunda, yena bhagava tenupasankamissama; upasankamitva etamattham bhagavato arocessama”ti.
mn104:4.4: “Evam, bhante”ti kho cundo samanuddeso ayasmato anandassa paccassosi.
mn104:4.5: Atha kho ayasma ca anando cundo ca samanuddeso yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn104:4.8: Tassa kalankiriyaya bhinna nigantha dvedhikajata …pe… bhinnathupe appatisarane’ti.
mn104:4.10: ‘ma heva bhagavato accayena sanghe vivado uppajji;
mn104:4.11: svassa vivado bahujanahitaya bahujanasukhaya bahuno janassa anatthaya ahitaya dukkhaya devamanussanan’”ti.
mn104:5.2: ye vo maya dhamma abhinna desita, seyyathidam—
mn104:5.3: cattaro satipatthana cattaro sammappadhana cattaro iddhipada pancindriyani panca balani satta bojjhanga ariyo atthangiko maggo, passasi no tvam, ananda, imesu dhammesu dvepi bhikkhu nanavade”ti?
mn104:5.4: “Ye me, bhante, dhamma bhagavata abhinna desita, seyyathidam—
mn104:5.5: cattaro satipatthana cattaro sammappadhana cattaro iddhipada pancindriyani panca balani satta bojjhanga ariyo atthangiko maggo, naham passami imesu dhammesu dvepi bhikkhu nanavade.
mn104:5.6: Ye ca kho, bhante, puggala bhagavantam patissayamanarupa viharanti tepi bhagavato accayena sanghe vivadam janeyyum ajjhajive va adhipatimokkhe va.
mn104:5.7: Svassa vivado bahujanahitaya bahujanasukhaya bahuno janassa anatthaya ahitaya dukkhaya devamanussanan”ti.
mn104:5.8: “Appamattako so, ananda, vivado yadidam—ajjhajive va adhipatimokkhe va.
mn104:5.9: Magge va hi, ananda, patipadaya va sanghe vivado uppajjamano uppajjeyya; svassa vivado bahujanahitaya bahujanasukhaya bahuno janassa anatthaya ahitaya dukkhaya devamanussanam.
mn104:6.4: Yo so, ananda, bhikkhu kodhano hoti upanahi so sattharipi agaravo viharati appatisso, dhammepi agaravo viharati appatisso, sanghepi agaravo viharati appatisso, sikkhayapi na paripurakari hoti.
mn104:6.5: Yo so, ananda, bhikkhu satthari agaravo viharati appatisso, dhamme … sanghe agaravo viharati appatisso, sikkhaya na paripurakari hoti, so sanghe vivadam janeti; yo hoti vivado bahujanahitaya bahujanasukhaya, bahuno janassa anatthaya ahitaya dukkhaya devamanussanam.
mn104:6.6: Evarupance tumhe, ananda, vivadamulam ajjhattam va bahiddha va samanupasseyyatha, tatra tumhe, ananda, tasseva papakassa vivadamulassa pahanaya vayameyyatha.
mn104:6.7: Evarupance tumhe, ananda, vivadamulam ajjhattam va bahiddha va na samanupasseyyatha. Tatra tumhe, ananda, tasseva papakassa vivadamulassa ayatim anavassavaya patipajjeyyatha.
mn104:6.8: Evametassa papakassa vivadamulassa pahanam hoti, evametassa papakassa vivadamulassa ayatim anavassavo hoti.
mn104:7-11.1: Puna caparam, ananda, bhikkhu makkhi hoti palasi …pe…
mn104:7-11.6: Yo so, ananda, bhikkhu sanditthiparamasi hoti adhanaggahi duppatinissaggi so sattharipi agaravo viharati appatisso, dhammepi agaravo viharati appatisso, sanghepi agaravo viharati appatisso, sikkhayapi na paripurakari hoti.
mn104:7-11.7: Yo so, ananda, bhikkhu satthari agaravo viharati appatisso, dhamme … sanghe … sikkhaya na paripurakari hoti so sanghe vivadam janeti; yo hoti vivado bahujanahitaya bahujanasukhaya, bahuno janassa anatthaya ahitaya dukkhaya devamanussanam.
mn104:7-11.8: Evarupance tumhe, ananda, vivadamulam ajjhattam va bahiddha va samanupasseyyatha. Tatra tumhe, ananda, tasseva papakassa vivadamulassa pahanaya vayameyyatha.
mn104:7-11.9: Evarupance tumhe, ananda, vivadamulam ajjhattam va bahiddha va na samanupasseyyatha, tatra tumhe, ananda, tasseva papakassa vivadamulassa ayatim anavassavaya patipajjeyyatha.
mn104:7-11.10: Evametassa papakassa vivadamulassa pahanam hoti, evametassa papakassa vivadamulassa ayatim anavassavo hoti.
mn104:13.1: Satta kho panime, ananda, adhikaranasamatha uppannuppannanam adhikarananam samathaya vupasamaya—
mn104:13.2: sammukhavinayo databbo, sativinayo databbo, amulhavinayo databbo, patinnaya karetabbam, yebhuyyasika, tassapapiyasika, tinavattharako.
mn104:14.2: Idhananda, bhikkhu vivadanti dhammoti va adhammoti va vinayoti va avinayoti va.
mn104:14.5: Dhammanettim samanumajjitva yatha tattha sameti tatha tam adhikaranam vupasametabbam.
mn104:14.7: evanca panidhekaccanam adhikarananam vupasamo hoti yadidam—
mn104:15.2: Te ce, ananda, bhikkhu na sakkonti tam adhikaranam tasmim avase vupasametum.
mn104:15.3: Tehananda, bhikkhuhi yasmim avase bahutara bhikkhu so avaso gantabbo.
mn104:15.6: Dhammanettim samanumajjitva yatha tattha sameti tatha tam adhikaranam vupasametabbam.
mn104:15.7: Evam kho, ananda, yebhuyyasika hoti, evanca panidhekaccanam adhikarananam vupasamo hoti yadidam—
mn104:16.2: Idhananda, bhikkhu bhikkhum evarupaya garukaya apattiya codenti parajikena va parajikasamantena va:
mn104:16.3: ‘saratayasma evarupim garukam apattim apajjita parajikam va parajikasamantam va’ti?
mn104:16.5: ‘na kho aham, avuso, sarami evarupim garukam apattim apajjita parajikam va parajikasamantam va’ti.
mn104:16.6: Tassa kho, ananda, bhikkhuno sativinayo databbo.
mn104:16.7: Evam kho, ananda, sativinayo hoti, evanca panidhekaccanam adhikarananam vupasamo hoti yadidam—
mn104:17.2: Idhananda, bhikkhu bhikkhum evarupaya garukaya apattiya codenti parajikena va parajikasamantena va:
mn104:17.3: ‘saratayasma evarupim garukam apattim apajjita parajikam va parajikasamantam va’ti?
mn104:17.5: ‘na kho aham, avuso, sarami evarupim garukam apattim apajjita parajikam va parajikasamantam va’ti.
mn104:17.7: ‘inghayasma sadhukameva janahi yadi sarasi evarupim garukam apattim apajjita parajikam va parajikasamantam va’ti.
mn104:17.9: ‘aham kho, avuso, ummadam papunim cetaso vipariyasam.
mn104:17.10: Tena me ummattakena bahum assamanakam ajjhacinnam bhasitaparikkantam.
mn104:17.13: Tassa kho, ananda, bhikkhuno amulhavinayo databbo.
mn104:17.14: Evam kho, ananda, amulhavinayo hoti, evanca panidhekaccanam adhikarananam vupasamo hoti yadidam—
mn104:18.2: Idhananda, bhikkhu codito va acodito va apattim sarati, vivarati uttanikaroti.
mn104:18.3: Tena, ananda, bhikkhuna vuddhataram bhikkhum upasankamitva ekamsam civaram katva pade vanditva ukkutikam nisiditva anjalim paggahetva evamassa vacaniyo:
mn104:18.4: ‘aham, bhante, itthannamam apattim apanno, tam patidesemi’ti.
mn104:18.10: Evam kho, ananda, patinnatakaranam hoti, evanca panidhekaccanam adhikarananam vupasamo hoti yadidam—
mn104:19.2: Idhananda, bhikkhu bhikkhum evarupaya garukaya apattiya codeti parajikena va parajikasamantena va:
mn104:19.3: ‘saratayasma evarupim garukam apattim apajjita parajikam va parajikasamantam va’ti?
mn104:19.5: ‘na kho aham, avuso, sarami evarupim garukam apattim apajjita parajikam va parajikasamantam va’ti.
mn104:19.7: ‘inghayasma sadhukameva janahi yadi sarasi evarupim garukam apattim apajjita parajikam va parajikasamantam va’ti.
mn104:19.9: ‘na kho aham, avuso, sarami evarupim garukam apattim apajjita parajikam va parajikasamantam va;
mn104:19.10: sarami ca kho aham, avuso, evarupim appamattikam apattim apajjita’ti.
mn104:19.12: ‘inghayasma sadhukameva janahi yadi sarasi evarupim garukam apattim apajjita parajikam va parajikasamantam va’ti?
mn104:19.14: ‘imanhi namaham, avuso, appamattikam apattim apajjitva aputtho patijanissami.
mn104:19.15: Kim panaham evarupim garukam apattim apajjitva parajikam va parajikasamantam va puttho na patijanissami’ti?
mn104:19.17: ‘imanhi nama tvam, avuso, appamattikam apattim apajjitva aputtho na patijanissasi, kim pana tvam evarupim garukam apattim apajjitva parajikam va parajikasamantam va puttho patijanissasi?
mn104:19.18: Inghayasma sadhukameva janahi yadi sarasi evarupim garukam apattim apajjita parajikam va parajikasamantam va’ti.
mn104:19.20: ‘sarami kho aham, avuso, evarupim garukam apattim apajjita parajikam va parajikasamantam va.
mn104:19.21: Dava me etam vuttam, rava me etam vuttam—
mn104:19.22: naham tam sarami evarupim garukam apattim apajjita parajikam va parajikasamantam va’ti.
mn104:19.23: Evam kho, ananda, tassapapiyasika hoti, evanca panidhekaccanam adhikarananam vupasamo hoti yadidam—
mn104:20.2: Idhananda, bhikkhunam bhandanajatanam kalahajatanam vivadapannanam viharatam bahum assamanakam ajjhacinnam hoti bhasitaparikkantam.
mn104:20.4: Sannipatitva ekatopakkhikanam bhikkhunam byattena bhikkhuna utthayasana ekamsam civaram katva anjalim panametva sangho napetabbo—
mn104:20.6: Idam amhakam bhandanajatanam kalahajatanam vivadapannanam viharatam bahum assamanakam ajjhacinnam bhasitaparikkantam.
mn104:20.7: Yadi sanghassa pattakallam, aham ya ceva imesam ayasmantanam apatti ya ca attano apatti, imesanceva ayasmantanam atthaya attano ca atthaya, sanghamajjhe tinavattharakena deseyyam, thapetva thullavajjam thapetva gihipatisamyuttan’ti.
mn104:20.8: Athaparesam ekatopakkhikanam bhikkhunam byattena bhikkhuna utthayasana ekamsam civaram katva anjalim panametva sangho napetabbo:
mn104:20.10: Idam amhakam bhandanajatanam kalahajatanam vivadapannanam viharatam bahum assamanakam ajjhacinnam bhasitaparikkantam.
mn104:20.11: Yadi sanghassa pattakallam, aham ya ceva imesam ayasmantanam apatti ya ca attano apatti, imesanceva ayasmantanam atthaya attano ca atthaya, sanghamajjhe tinavattharakena deseyyam, thapetva thullavajjam thapetva gihipatisamyuttan’ti.
mn104:20.12: Evam kho, ananda, tinavattharako hoti, evanca panidhekaccanam adhikarananam vupasamo hoti yadidam—
mn104:21.1: Chayime, ananda, dhamma saraniya piyakarana garukarana sangahaya avivadaya samaggiya ekibhavaya samvattanti.
mn104:21.3: Idhananda, bhikkhuno mettam kayakammam paccupatthitam hoti sabrahmacarisu avi ceva raho ca.
mn104:21.4: Ayampi dhammo saraniyo piyakarano garukarano sangahaya avivadaya samaggiya ekibhavaya samvattati.
mn104:21.5: Puna caparam, ananda, bhikkhuno mettam vacikammam paccupatthitam hoti sabrahmacarisu avi ceva raho ca.
mn104:21.6: Ayampi dhammo saraniyo piyakarano garukarano sangahaya avivadaya samaggiya ekibhavaya samvattati.
mn104:21.7: Puna caparam, ananda, bhikkhuno mettam manokammam paccupatthitam hoti sabrahmacarisu avi ceva raho ca.
mn104:21.8: Ayampi dhammo saraniyo piyakarano garukarano sangahaya avivadaya samaggiya ekibhavaya samvattati.
mn104:21.9: Puna caparam, ananda, bhikkhu—ye te labha dhammika dhammaladdha antamaso pattapariyapannamattampi tatharupehi labhehi—apativibhattabhogi hoti, silavantehi sabrahmacarihi sadharanabhogi.
mn104:21.10: Ayampi dhammo saraniyo piyakarano garukarano sangahaya avivadaya samaggiya ekibhavaya samvattati.
mn104:21.11: Puna caparam, ananda, bhikkhu—yani tani silani akhandani acchiddani asabalani akammasani bhujissani vinnuppasatthani aparamatthani samadhisamvattanikani tatharupesu silesu—silasamannagato viharati sabrahmacarihi avi ceva raho ca.
mn104:21.12: Ayampi dhammo saraniyo piyakarano garukarano sangahaya avivadaya samaggiya ekibhavaya samvattati.
mn104:21.13: Puna caparam, ananda, bhikkhu—yayam ditthi ariya niyyanika niyyati takkarassa samma dukkhakkhayaya tatharupaya ditthiya—ditthisamannagato viharati sabrahmacarihi avi ceva raho ca.
mn104:21.14: Ayampi dhammo saraniyo piyakarano garukarano sangahaya avivadaya samaggiya ekibhavaya samvattati.
mn104:21.15: Ime kho, ananda, cha saraniya dhamma piyakarana garukarana sangahaya avivadaya samaggiya ekibhavaya samvattanti.
mn104:22.1: Ime ce tumhe, ananda, cha saraniye dhamme samadaya vatteyyatha, passatha no tumhe, ananda, tam vacanapatham anum va thulam va yam tumhe nadhivaseyyatha”ti?
mn104:22.3: “Tasmatihananda, ime cha saraniye dhamme samadaya vattatha.
mn104:22.4: Tam vo bhavissati digharattam hitaya sukhaya”ti.
mn104:22.6: Attamano ayasma anando bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditi.
